mapper.update: update qna set step=step+1 where ref =#{} and step > #{step}
update set qna title = #{title}, contents=#{contents} where num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into qna values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, board_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.select:
select count(num) from qna
where title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where writer like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where contents like '%'||#{search}||'%'

select*from (select rownum R,Q.* from (select * from qna
where title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where writer like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where contents like '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by ref desc, step asc) Q) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
